import React, { useState } from "react"; const IndividualInvoice = (props) => { return (

{props.name}

Product Name: {props.productName}

Quantity: {props.quantity}

Price: {props.price}

Amount: {props.amount}

Created: {}

Updated:

Due Date:

Bill No: {props.billNo}

Gross Amount: {props.grossAmount}

GST Amount: {props.gstAmount}

Net Amount: {props.netAmount}

Status: {props.status}

Notes: {props.notes}

); }; export default IndividualInvoice;
